name: AddProductToStore
description:
Add a new product to a Mailchimp store.

Use this tool to add a new product to a specific store in Mailchimp. This is useful for updating store inventories or launching new products.

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the store where the product will be added. This is required to specify the target store.

parameters.name: product_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details about the product to be added, including id, title, handle, URL, description, type, vendor, image, variants, images, and publish date.

id.description: A unique identifier for the product.

image_url.description: The image URL for a product.

id.description: A unique identifier for the product variant.

title.description: The title of a product variant.

url.description: The URL for a product variant.

sku.description: The stock keeping unit (SKU) of a product variant.

price.description: The price of a product variant.

inventory_quantity.description: The inventory quantity of a product variant.

image_url.description: The image URL for a product variant.

backorders.description: The backorders of a product variant.

visibility.description: The visibility of a product variant.

variants.description: An array of the product's variants. At least one variant is required for each product. A variant can use the same `id` and `title` as the parent product.

id.description: A unique identifier for the product image.

url.description: The URL for a product image.

variant_ids.description: The list of product variants using the image.

images.description: An array of the product's images.

published_at_foreign.description: The date and time the product was published.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

id.description: A unique identifier for the product.

image_url.description: The image URL for a product.

id.description: A unique identifier for the product variant.

url.description: The URL for a product variant.

image_url.description: The image URL for a product variant.

backorders.description: The backorders of a product variant.

visibility.description: The visibility of a product variant.

variants.description: An array of the product's variants. At least one variant is required for each product. A variant can use the same `id` and `title` as the parent product.

id.description: A unique identifier for the product image.

url.description: The URL for a product image.

variant_ids.description: The list of product variants using the image.

images.description: An array of the product's images.

published_at_foreign.description: The date and time the product was published.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
